articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Intel extends warranties by two years for crash-prone Core desktop CPUs - Ars Technica
articles.description: Intel's microcode fix won't help CPUs that are already damaged.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ Even mainstream CPUs like the Core i5-13400 could theoretically be affected by Intel's crashing issues.
82
Intel will be releasing a microcode update to prevent further damage to crashing … [+2110 chars]

articles.title: Revolutionary Submarine Discovers Ice Shelf Mysteries, Then Disappears Without a Trace - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Using the unmanned submarine Ran, researchers mapped the underside of West Antarctica's Dotson Ice Shelf, uncovering complex ice formations and significant melt areas driven by underwater currents, crucial for enhancing sea level rise predictions. An internat…
articles.content:
ByUniversity of GothenburgAugust 2, 2024
The expedition was carried out in regions of drifting ice in West Antarctica in 2022. On the return visit in 2024, Ran disappeared without a trace under the … [+6413 chars]
